body:
boot2docker (at least on macosx and windows) does have some support for volumes thru VBox guest addition, see https://github.com/boot2docker/boot2docker/pull/534

It's exposed thru the `-vbox-share` flag: https://github.com/boot2docker/boot2docker-cli/blob/93908af574aa4fa11bf84990edde7c07e7d6ded5/virtualbox/machine.go#L142
